name: Mobi Builder
author: Mobi Builder

sections.description: Mobi Builder is an online website that allows you to build mobile apps without coding. This plugin allows you to embed public Mobi Builder projects into your website.
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

We have a guide on how to use this plugin at the following URL: https://mobibuilder.tech/documentation/public-projects/

What customizable options are there for this plugin?

You can change whether you want a ‘Open this project in a new window’ button to appear and various options about the border surrouding the embedded project.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Embed Mobi Builder projects into your WordPress site.
  • Customizable options.

short_description: This plugin allows you to embed a Mobi Builder project into your website.
